GPUOutOfMemoryError.summary: The GPUOutOfMemoryError interface of the {{domxref("WebGPU API", "WebGPU API", "", "nocode")}} describes an out-of-memory (oom) error indicating that there was not enough free memory to complete the requested operation.

remarks.para: It represents one of the types of errors surfaced by and the event.

Out-of-memory errors should be relatively rare in a well-behaved app but are less predictable than s. This is because they are dependent on the device your app is running on as well as other apps that are using GPU resources at the time.

-The WebGPU API
-WebGPU Error Handling best practices
